item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Steven Hall
item.description: "I looked at her and a voice inside me said, <i>we only see starlight because all the stars are bleeding.</i>" -- Steven Hall

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Begin at the beginning," the King said, very gravely, "and go on till you come to the end: then stop." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "The only thing worse than a boy who hates you: a boy that loves you." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Jeff Lindsay
item.description: "What to wear? I could think of no guidelines on what we were wearing this season to a party forced on you to celebrate an unwanted engagement that might turn into a violent confrontation with a vengeful maniac. Clearly brown shoes were out, but beyond that nothing really seemed de rigueur." -- Jeff Lindsay

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Jeff Lindsay
item.description: "Nothing in life is fair. Fair is a dirty word and I'll thank you not to use that language around me." -- Jeff Lindsay

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "All God does is watch us and kill us when we get boring. We must never, ever be boring." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami
